de.mrapp.android.preference.activity

Class PreferenceHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceHeader

  • public class PreferenceHeader
extends Object
    A navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

      • PreferenceHeader

        public PreferenceHeader(Context context,
                        int titleId)
        Creates a new navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used to retrieve the string resource, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        titleId - The resource id of the title of the navigation item as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid string resource
